## Implement getFragments method

```{r}
df.frags <- getFragments("CC(C)(C)C(O)C(OC1=CC=C(Cl)C=C1)N1C=NC=N1", treeDepth = 1) 
idx<-order(df.frags$MH1P)
df.frags <- df.frags[idx, ]
```

### Plot in-silico spec
```{r in-silico, fig.retina=3}
plot(table(df.frags$MH1P))
```


## Compute and Plot Matches

```{r matchPlot}
table.df.frags <- table(df.frags$MH1P)
library(protViz)
library(knitr)

par(mar=c(6,6,6,2))
rv <- lapply(MS2Scans, function(x){
   plot(x$mZ, x$intensity,
        type = "h",
        main = x$title,
        xlab = "m/Z", 
        log='y',
        # ylim=c(-max(x$intensity), max(x$intensity)),
        ylab = "intensity", 
        sub = x$scanType)
  
  # compute match
  idx.NN <- findNN(x$mZ, df.frags$MH1P)
  error <- abs(x$mZ - df.frags$MH1P[idx.NN])
  hits <- (error < 0.0005)
  mZ.hits <- unique(df.frags$MH1P[idx.NN[hits]])
  abline(v = mZ.hits, col=rgb(0.8,0.3,0.3, alpha = 0.4))
  axis(3, mZ.hits, round(mZ.hits,2))
  
  hit.df <- df.frags[idx.NN[hits],]
  
   print(kable(hit.df))
   hit.df
})
```
